thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Susan Moore

author: Susan Moore
title: Susan Moore
text: Our choice of Trusted Housesitters was fabulous. We had a delightful couple from NSW. They looked after our 2 Labs, 4 chickens and no,Eros goldfish for a month. Our fur babies loved them. Nothing was too much for them. The house was immaculate on our arrival home along with all the coloured concrete paths steam cleaned. Nel and Harvey we're sorry to see them go and our neighbours on both sides wished they were staying as they fitted into the community so well. We would have no reservations in recommending them. From this exercise I am very sure we will always remain friends. Thanks again Trusted Housesitters
